ValueReaderFactory
public class GaussianValueReaderFactory
extends Object
implements ValueReaderFactory

A Factory for creating GaussianValueReader instances.

Author:
Dario Seidl

Constructor Summary
GaussianValueReaderFactory(double mean, double std, double variateStd, RandomSource randomSource)
          Sets up a factory for creating GaussianValueReader instances, with the initial value drawn from a normal distribution with mean mean and standard deviation std.
 
Method Summary
 ValueReader createValueReader()
          Returns a new GaussianValueReader initialized with a random initial value and parameter values as specified in the constructor of this class.

Constructor Detail

GaussianValueReaderFactory

public GaussianValueReaderFactory(double mean,
                                  double std,
                                  double variateStd,
                                  RandomSource randomSource)
Sets up a factory for creating GaussianValueReader instances, with the initial value drawn from a normal distribution with mean mean and standard deviation std.

Parameters:
mean - the mean of the normal distribution from which the initial value is chosen.
std - the standard deviation of the normal distribution from which the initial value is chosen.
variateStd - after each call of ValueReader.getCurrentValue() the return value is changed by a number chosen at random from a normal distribution with mean 0 and standard deviation std.
randomSource - an instance of RandomSource used for generating the random numbers in this class.
Method Detail

createValueReader

public ValueReader createValueReader()
Returns a new GaussianValueReader initialized with a random initial value and parameter values as specified in the constructor of this class.

Specified by:
createValueReader in interface ValueReaderFactory
